Text: Top News  Texas Instruments, Beyond Meat, Alphabet & more By rubie  Check out the companies making headlines before the bell:  Texas Instruments  -  Texas Instruments raised its quarterly dividend by 17%. The chipmaker will now pay 90 cents per share, up from the prior 77 cents a share, with the next dividend payable November 18 to stockholders of record on October 31.

Effect: The chipmaker will now pay 90 cents per share, up from the prior 77 cents a share, with the next dividend payable November 18 to stockholders of record on October 31.
